verbose_text: Inspired from this, here we report that we have developed a Pt loaded and hydrogen treated WO 3 that not only can be effectively activated by full-spectrum (UV-visible -NIR) light, but also has long persistent energy storage ability (over 300 h) to have formaldehyde degraded in dark.
evidence: WO 3  that not only can be effectively activated by full-spectrum (UV-visible -NIR) light
